cast.overview: In 1879, during the Anglo-Zulu War, man-of-the-people Lt. Chard and snooty Lt. Bromhead are in charge of defending the isolated and vastly outnumbered Natal outpost of Rorke's Drift from tribal hordes.
cast.title: Zulu

details.biography: Welsh actor mainly known for his appearances in war films: Zulu, The Dambusters and All Quiet on the Western Front. He also had a memorable role in spy spoof, Modesty Blaise. He is also well-known  for his appearances in British TV series, such as Rumpole of the Bailey, The Bill and On the Line.
details.name: Denys Graham
